thread.title: Breaking: Salman Khan ACQUITTED in 18-year-old Arms Act case by Jodhpur court!
thread.title_full: Breaking: Salman Khan ACQUITTED in 18-year-old Arms Act case by Jodhpur court!

author: Urvi Parikh
title: Breaking: Salman Khan ACQUITTED in 18-year-old Arms Act case by Jodhpur court!
text: January 17, 2017 Urvi Parikh 358 reads 0 comments Actor Salman Khan, who reached Jodhpur last night for the final hearing in the Arms Act case, has finally been acquitted. The Jodhpur court pronounced its verdict today. Salman arrived minutes before the verdict at the court and soon as the judgement was pronounced, he exited the venue. Also, present in the court was Salman's sister Alvira Agnihotri. "#FLASH Jodhpur CJM Court acquits Salman Khan in the Arms Act Case," tweeted ANI. Salman Khan's lawyer elaborated further, "Justice has won. Prosecution completely failed to prove charges under sec 3/25, 3/27 of Arms Act. In the 102 page judgment, CJM D.S.Rajpurohit says prosecution evidence against Salman Khan not adequate." Meanwhile, the Public Prosecutor stated, "Salman has been given benefit of doubt. We'll decide on the further action once we receive the copy of the order."
